alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 10:52AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Henderson and northeastern Union Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 951 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Corydon, or near Breckinridge Center, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Corydon around 1005 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
